description:
Director of Business Development

We have been asked to help find an exceptional business development expert with experience calling on medical providers and practices across the US. This is a fantastic opportunity to join a rapidly growing, niche healthcare-related organization, with a phenomenal reputation across the United States and a track record of making a significant difference for those medical professionals they partner with. If you have a background in physician or medical practice relations and have a desire to be part of a private equity-backed organization with tremendous momentum and lot of room to grow, this opportunity could be for you. Contact us today!

A successful candidate for this Director of Business Development role will possess the following:
• Bachelor’s Degree in business, communications, or healthcare related majors from an accredited college or university.
• Minimum of five years of successful sales and/or business development experience, with at least three of those years in successful sales to physician practices.
• Strong interpersonal skills with an ability to relate to people at all levels of an organization with professionalism and integrity.
• Ability to work in a high growth, collaborative, dynamic, client-focused culture.
• Ability to travel frequently and live in close proximity to the corporate headquarters, located in the northern suburbs of Chicago, IL.

Compensation: Compensation will be a combination of base and bonus with total compensation, at plan, somewhere close or just above $200k annually.

Benefits: Full

Desired Location: Chicago with the ability to frequent the corporate headquarters in the northern suburbs frequently.

Career 1 Source has been focused on Executive Level recruiting since 2008, our network runs deep. If this role isn't quite the right fit for you, but are still open to exploring career growth, feel free to do so HERE. Or, if you know someone who may be interested in this role, please reach out HERE. We provide up to a $500 referral bonus for individuals that are referred, and we place.
• Candidates must be eligible to work in the US as well as meet the qualifications listed above in order to be considered for the Director of Business Development job.
